php.LBL_CREDITLIMITS_INFO: Em nosso sistema conseguimos implementar a habilidade de controlar o Limite de Crédito para as Contas. Esta funcionalidade é utilizada para limitar o débito em excesso das Contas em operações permanentes. Limites de Crédito serão permitidos apenas para Contas que possuem um bom histórico de relacionamento permitindo um prazo maior para pagamento, isso também reflete na situação de que uma Conta só pode efetuar uma nova compra caso o Saldo da dívida anterior seja quitado [current balance and issued document exceed granted limit].
php.LBL_GLOBAL: Tax from the list of available taxes
php.LBL_ALERT_TAX_CONFIG_DESC:
Summation type:
In total:
- Total value of all taxes calculated on the value of product/services.
[Example]
There are two taxes selected: the first one 23%%, the second one 8%%. The system sums the value of both taxes from the oryginal net amount. 
In the above example for the net value 100zł, the gross amount will be (100zł * 1,31) = 131,00 zł

Cascade:
- Tax amount is calculated each time from the product/service value.
[Example]
Two taxes are selected: the first one 23%%, the second one 8%%. The system calculates the value for the first tax and then the value of second tax is added. 
In the above example for the net value of 100zł, the gross amount will be (100zł * 1,23) * 1,08 = 132,84 zł

Tax settings description:
Tax from the list of available taxes:
- Specified in settings for Advanced Modules.
Tax from products/services list:
- Specified individaully for products in the Products module.
Custom tax:
- Specified once for a selected record.
Account's tax:
- Specified individually for a selected customer.
